name: Birdo (Dschunus)
description:
(FULLSCREEN TO PLAY THE GAME OTHERWISE IT WILL LOOK MESSY)

Unfortunatly Birds from this era cant fly anymore which is why this one needs to jump his way to his nest. Help this little Fella get back to his home and jump your way through!

Play a bird searching for its nest. The LESS you jump the MORE height you will gain! If you have no Stamina you will not be able to jump as high as when you have a lot of stamina built up.

This Game was made during the Blackthornprod Gamejam. Everything was made from scratch other than the font i was using.

Controls:

WASD = Movement

SPACE = Jump

R = Restart the level if you think you failed

E = Pickup an item or get to the next Level

I hope you have a lot of fun and i am happy that i joined the third Blackthornprod Gamejam!
